answers.answer: I would get them for days straight the only thing that worked for me wad two extra strength Tylenol and a can of coke right after I took them. It was like a miracle treatment lol
When my sister had preeclampsia she had a non stop headache. I would get it checked out
Oh that is Def a good idea since you are so far along! My friend had it bad around 37 wks and had her son the next day because her blood pressure was so high
Deffinitely talk to your doctor about it.  Also, drink several glasses of water this evening  dehydration can cause severe headaches.
Yes maam, I still have a headache right now. This has been going on for 3 days now & I'll be 37 weeks on Friday!
Okay thanks for the responses ladies !! Definitely getting everything checked tomorrow !

question: I have had a brutal headache for over a week now and it is driving me insane !! I see my OB tomorrow so will be bringing it up but has anyone else experienced anything similiar? I am 37 weeks today.
title: Severe Headache !
